definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

sentences.english: They were in proper tennis whites .
sentences.chinese: 他們都穿着可體的白色網球服。

sentences.english: She made a cheongsam especially for this performance that fits her very well.
sentences.chinese: 爲了這次演出，她特意定做了一身可體的旗袍。

sentences.english: The physiological action is similar to that of hydrocortisone.
sentences.chinese: 生理行動與那是相似於氫化可體松。
